title: 748: QUANT ANALYST PLAN B PREDICTS BITCOIN HYPERBOLIC SCENARIO - HERE’S HIS Q1 BTC PRICE TARGET!!
description:
Plan B is updating his Bitcoin price target for the first quarter of 2022 and reveals when he thinks BTC will see a hyperbolic surge where it outperforms all other assets.

In an interview with Anthony Pompliano, the widely followed crypto analyst says that based on his various models, there’s a possibility for BTC to ascend as much as 700% by early next year.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
